title: jail：把一个玩家关进监狱的权限是啥？
author: AzhangzhefuA
txt_content: 就是关监狱的权限，关人的= =162

replies.author: fzh5837302
replies.txt_content: /manuaddp  玩家名 essentials.jails   还是.jail  反正就这2个..

replies.author: jiuerd
replies.txt_content:
Moderatordeljailessentials.deljailAllow access to the /deljail command.Moderatorjailsessentials.jailsAllow access to the /jails command.Moderatorsetjailessentials.setjailAllow access to the /setjail command.Moderatortogglejailessentials.jail.allow.<command>Allows essentials commands to be used while jailed (requires regular perm).Moderatortogglejailessentials.jail.exemptPrevents a specified group or player from being jailedModeratortogglejailessentials.togglejailAllow access to the /togglejail command.Moderatortogglejailessentials.togglejail.offlineAllows jailing of players who are offline.  This may allow you to jail exempt players.看ess权限节点
×

×

replies.txt_content:
jiuerd 发表于 2014-3-28 06:57
看ess权限节点

求翻译。。。。

replies.author: jiuerd
replies.txt_content:
AzhangzhefuA 发表于 2014-3-28 15:32
求翻译。。。。
1.2.3.6条是使用对应命令的权限；
4是被监狱的玩家使用普通命令的权限；
5是防止被关监狱的；
7是可以把离线玩家关监狱；
